jd: From: Rahul Mishra, Vyzeinc rmishra@vyzeinc.com Reply to: rmishra@vyzeinc.com Details on the .NET Developer role below: GC, USC, · Minimum 8 years of proficiency with Object-Oriented development methodologies using MS .NET VB (primarily) and C# in a work environment· Database Experience using SQL in a mission-critical relational database application.· Ability to work independently with minimal supervision Excellent communication skills and ability to interact with other developers and second level support engineers· Informix experience storing images in blobspaces.· Operating System Experience: Unix/Linux (RHEL), Windows· Experience with additional programming languages: Java, JavaScript Front-End Frameworks (Angular/React).· Candidates who have experience with Imaging toolkits such as GDPicture, DevExpress, iText# will receive priority consideration· Experience with Agile programming methodology having multiple software iterations. Writing and debugging DDL/DML.· Experience with Web Server (Apache/IIS) configuration and support, SOAP/REST Webservice Development and Consumption· Strong troubleshooting experience using tools like Fiddler, PostMan, SoapUI Best RegardsRahul Mishra US Technical Recruiter |Vyze Inc.E-Mail: rmishra@vyzeinc.com
